resources.string: Bluetooth registration of the app failed, try to restart bluetooth or the device.
Registration of the bluetooth adapter failed.
Bluetooth Service is not connected.\n\nMake sure that Bluetooth is enabled in your device settings.
No devices available.\n\nConnect your phone over the device settings.

This app requires access to the Bluetooth interface of this smartwatch in order to send signals to your smartphone.\n\nWhen reading out the Bluetooth interface, devices in the vicinity can be identified.
You have rejected the Bluetooth permission too often.\n\nIf you want to use the app, you must now activate Bluetooth permission for this app in the device settings.
Stop the app and unregister bluetooth services.
